net.powermatcher.api

Interface AgentEndpoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TransformingConcentrator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseAgentEndpoint, Concentrator, PeakShavingConcentrator

    public interface AgentEndpoint
extends Agent
    AgentEndpoint defines the interface for classes that can receive a PriceUpdate and send a Bid , based on the Price of that PriceUpdate. An AgentEndpoint can be linked with zero or one MatcherEndpoint instances. These are linked by a Session.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AgentEndpoint.Status
      The AgentEndpoint.Status object describes the current status and configuration of an AgentEndpoint.

    • Method Detail

      • getDesiredParentId

        java.lang.String getDesiredParentId()
        Returns:
        the id of the desired parent Agent.

      • getStatus

        AgentEndpoint.Status getStatus()
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface Agent
        Returns:
        The current Agent.Status of the Agent. This returns a snapshot of the state that won't change. If used at a later time, the snapshot should be refreshed.

      • connectToMatcher

        void connectToMatcher(Session session)
        Connects this AgentEndpoint instance to a MatcherEndpoint.
        Parameters:
        session - the Session that will link this AgentEndpoint with a MatcherEndpoint.

      • matcherEndpointDisconnected

        void matcherEndpointDisconnected(Session session)
        Notifies the Agent that this AgentEndpoint instance is disconnected from the MatcherEndpoint.
        Parameters:
        session - the Session that used to link the MatcherEndpoint with this AgentEndpoint.

      • handlePriceUpdate

        void handlePriceUpdate(PriceUpdate priceUpdate)
        Called by MatcherEndpoint via the Session to update the Price used by this AgentEndpoint instance.
        Parameters:
        priceUpdate - The new Price, wrapped in a PriceUpdate, along with the id of the Bid it was based on.
